mapper.sql: select s.*, ad.wx_id as admin_wx_id, ad.wx_name as admin_wx_name, ad.wx_avatar_url as admin_wx_avatar_url, ad.real_name as admin_real_name, ad.user_type as admin_user_type, cl.name as class_name, cl.status as class_status, co.name as course_name, co.status as course_status from tb_sign_info s inner join tb_classes cl on s.class_id = cl.id inner join tb_admin ad on s.admin_id = ad.id left join tb_course co on s.course_id = co.id
mapper.insert: insert into tb_sign_info ( admin_id, class_id, course_id, start_date, stop_date, address, status) values (#{admin.id}, #{classes.id}, #{course.id}, #{startDate}, #{stopDate}, #{address}, #{status})
mapper.update: update tb_sign_info set admin_id=#{admin.id}, class_id=#{classes.id}, course_id=#{course.id}, start_date=#{startDate}, stop_date=#{stopDate}, address=#{address}, status=#{status}, modify_time=#{modifyTime} where id = #{id}

update.foreach: update tb_sign_info set admin_id=#{info.admin.id}, class_id=#{info.classes.id}, course_id=#{info.course.id}, start_date=#{info.startDate}, stop_date=#{info.stopDate}, address=#{info.address}, status=#{info.status}, modify_time=#{info.modifyTime} where id = #{info.id}
